set(
  BOOST_ROOT
  $ENV{BOOST_ROOT}
)
set(
  BOOST_LIBRARYDIR
  "${BOOST_ROOT}/stage/lib"
)
set(
  Boost_NO_SYSTEM_PATHS
  ON
)

find_package(
  Boost
  REQUIRED
  COMPONENTS
    chrono
    program_options
    unit_test_framework
)

if(Boost_FOUND)
  set_target_properties(
    Boost::boost
    Boost::chrono
    Boost::program_options
    Boost::unit_test_framework
    PROPERTIES
      IMPORTED_GLOBAL
      true
  )
endif()
